General.Name: Camelot Electronics Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Camelot Electronic Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, production, and sale of printed circuit boards in China and internationally. Its products are used in new-energy vehicles, traditional automotive parts, communication engineering, industrial control, consumer electronics, medical devices, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Camelot (Qing Yuan) Hytec Technologies Investment Limited Company. Camelot Electronic Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Qingyuan, China.
